name: cypress_demo
description: This is a boilerplate for Cypress projects

scripts.test: npm run clean:reports && npx cypress run
scripts.remove: rm -rf mochawesome-report && rm -rf cypress/reports/*_*.json && rm report.json
scripts.generate-report: npm run merge-reports && marge report.json --inline && npm run copy-reports && npm run remove

author: Md. Arifuzzaman
